description: Katsushirou is a fledgling samurai, too young to have fought in the war. He has grown up feeling he didn`t have the grit necessary to survive in this world, and has devoted himself to the way of the samurai to fix that aspect of himself. After for long having been looking for a samurai to train him, he feels he has finally found his master when he meets http://anidb.net/ch3954 [Kanbee].
name: Katsushirou
